title: Accessibility problems
description: When I launch the Help view, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame or the content frame).
OB: The tab key does not respond in the Help view when launched.
EB: The tab key should be functional in the Help view upon launch.
SR: On March 26, 2002, on Windows 2000, the tab key does not have any effect when I launch the Help view.
